Plot: Eminem, Paul Rosenberg, Dr. Dre, and 50 Cent all reflect on how Shady Records became one of the most dominant labels of the 2000s.
Title: Not Afraid: The Shady Records Story
Writer: Insanul Ahmed (storyline), Isanul Ahmed, Damien Scott (storyline), Damien Scott
Actors: 50 Cent, Royce Da 59, Dr. Dre, Eminem
